definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Ge 33:16; Job 1:14 cf. De 32:14, 2Sa 17:29) cattle, herd, ox (Ar. baqarun, Aram. [[בַּקְרָא]], [[בַּקְרְתָא]], baqro0 (cf. also Hom:NS 222 ff.); name from ploughing, so Thes Lag:BN 51 al.)—abs. ´[[בּ]] Ge 12:16 +; cstr. [[בְּקַר]] Nu 7:88; sf. [[בְּקָֽרְךָ]] Ge 45:10 +; [[בְּקָרֶָךָ]] Ex 20:24, Je 5:17; [[בְּקָרוֹ]] 1Sa 11:7, 2Sa 12:4; [[בְּקַרְכֶם]] De 12:6; [[בְּקָרָם]] Je 3:24 +; pl. [[בְּקָרִים]] Am 6:12 (al. rd. [[בקר ים]]) 2Ch 4:3 (but rd. [[פְּקָעִים]] v. ‖ 1Ki 7:24 infr.); sf. [[בְּקָרֵינוּ]] Ne 10:37; rd. [[בקריכם]] for [[בחוריכם]] 1Sa 8:16 LXX We Dr;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: cattle, generic (never pl. in form) Ge 12:6, Ge 13:5, Ge 20:14, Ge 21:27, Ge 24:35, Le 1:2, De 8:13, 1Sa 11:5, Ho 5:6, Joe 1:18, 1Ch 27:29, 1Ch 27:29 + oft. (frequently ‖[[חאׁן]]); as grazing, 1Ch 27:29 +; in sim. ´[[כַּבּ]] Job 40:15, Is 11:7, Is 65:25; as lowing (´[[קוֹל הַבּ]]) 1Sa 15:14; [[מִקְנֵה בָקָר]] possession of (i.e. property in) cattle Ge 6:14, Ge 47:17 (both J); ´[[עֶדְרֵי ב]] Joe 1:18 herds of cattle; esp. [[בֶּן־בָּקָר]] son of cattle (i.e. belonging to the [[בקר]]), to denote a single ox, calf, etc.; as used for food Ge 18:7 cf. v:Ge 18:8 (J);—in these prob. = calf (v. also 1Sa 14:32 [[בָּקָר וּבְנֵי בָקָר]]); usually for sacrifice (Hex only P) Nu 15:8, Nu 15:9; ´[[בֶּן־הַבּ]] Le 1:5; appos. [[עֵגֶל]] †Le 9:2; —cf. [[עֶגְלַת בָּקָר]] †De 21:3, 1Sa 16:2, Is 7:21; —mostly appos. [[פַּר]] Ex 29:1 + 27 t.; also pl. † [[פָּרִיםַ בני בקר]] Nu 28:11, Nu 28:19, Nu 28:27, Nu 29:13, Nu 29:17 (on all these cf. [[בֵּן]]); also indef. cattle, oxen, of a number not specified Nu 7:87, Nu 7:88 (in both enumerated as [[פָּרִים]]); Nu 22:40, 1Sa 14:32, 1Sa 15:21, 1Ki 1:9, 1Ki 7:29, 1Ki 7:29 (here of graven work) 1Ki 8:5, 1Ch 12:40, 2Ch 5:6, 2Ch 18:2, Is 22:13, Ps 66:15; also as beasts of burden † 1Ch 12:40.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a particulur herd of cattle Ge 18:7 (J); cf. pl. [[בְּקָרֵינוּ]], our herds, only Ne 10:37.

more individually, head of cattle,—yet alw. of more than one (Hex mostly P; pl. only Am 6:12 + 2Ch 4:3 v. supr.); of two Nu 7:17 + 11 t. Nu 7; † cf. also ´[[חֶמֶד ב]] yoke (pair) of oxen 1Sa 11:7 cf. v:1Sa 11:7, 1Ki 19:21 cf. v:1Ki 19:21 (ploughing, cf. v:1Ki 19:19); also 2Sa 6:6 = 1Ch 13:9 (drawing a cart, cf. Nu 7:3 f. 1Sa 6:7 f.), 2Sa 24:22 = 1Ch 21:33, 2Sa 24:22, 2Sa 24:24, 1Ki 19:20, Am 6:12 (pl.); 500 yoke of oxen Job 1:3 cf. v:Job 1:14; 1000 yoke Job 42:12; further, of four Nu 7:7; five Ex 21:37 ([[תַּחַת]] [[הַשּׁוֹר]]); seven 2Ch 29:22 (‖[[פָּרִים]] v:2Ch 29:21); eight Nu 7:8; ten 1Ki 5:3; twelve Nu 7:3 (singly called [[שׁוֹר]]) cf. v:Nu 7:6; of the twelve brazen bulls beneath the sea in Sol.'s temple 1Ki 7:25, 1Ki 7:44 = 2Ch 4:4, 2Ch 4:15 cf. 2Ki 16:17, 2Ch 4:3 ([[דְּמוּת בְּקָרִיס]]) v:2Ch 4:3 (but rd. in both [[פְּקָעִים]], as ‖ 1Ki 7:24 cf. Be Öt) v:2Ch 4:4, Je 52:20; of twenty 1Ki 5:3; seventy 2Ch 29:32; hundreds or thousands 1Ki 8:63 = 2Ch 7:5, 2Ch 15:11, 2Ch 29:33, 2Ch 35:7, 2Ch 35:8, 2Ch 35:9 (cf. v:2Ch 35:12), & Nu 31:33, Nu 31:38, Nu 31:44 †. Eze 4:15 (opp. [[גֶּלֲלֵי הָאָדָם]]).
